name: admin.emoji.remove
desc: Remove an emoji across an Enterprise organization

name.desc: The name of the emoji to be removed. Colons (`:myemoji:`) around the value are not required, although they may be included.

errors.failed_to_remove_emoji: Failed to remove the specified emoji.
errors.failure_removing_emoji: This emoji could not be removed. It might be part of the standard Unicode set or the default Slack package.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org owners and Admins.
